pageProps.title: GitHub - pixeltris/GK6X: Configure keys, macros, and lighting on GK6X keyboards (GK64, GK84, GK61, etc)

children.value: This is a command-line tool for mapping keys, macros, and lighting for GK6X keyboards (GK64, GK84, GK61, etc). This can be used as an alternative to the official software (Windows üëÅ / Mac).
